title: 求教服务器pc端设置
author: charlie2467
txt_content:
Properties Config file
#Fri Jun 14 14:42:26 GMT 2013
server-name=Minecraft: PE Server
description=Server made using PocketMine-MP
motd=Welcome @player to this server!
server-ip=
server-port=19132
server-type=normal
memory-limit=512M
last-update=off
white-list=off
spawn-protection=8
view-distance=10
max-players=20
allow-flight=off
spawn-animals=on
spawn-mobs=on
gamemode=0
hardcore=off
pvp=on
difficulty=3
generator-settings=
level-name=mm play
level-seed=hujiaming
level-type=DEFAULT
enable-query=on
enable-rcon=off
rcon.password=zhiB0Vn2If
send-usage=on

这些该怎么设置？
管理员命令有哪些？
有什么必要插件？
怎么才能在地图上搞出点活的东西？刷怪和动物的选项应该在这里面被我打开的啊？

replies.author: Attect
replies.txt_content: 不支持生物和怪物活动
